alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Marion; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 14 at 12:51AM CST until December 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Bledsoe, Sequatchie and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sequatchie River near Whitwell TN. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural land occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 4.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.0 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.4 feet on 10/07/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. this afternoon at 400 PM CST.
